card.title: Apollo 15
card.shortDescription: Stay during 12 days on the Moon and Use Lunar Vehicle
card.longDescription: First space flight mission of the Apollo Program to carry astronauts beyond low Earth orbit, reach Earth's moon, orbit it and return safely to Earth. Crew :Frank Borman, James Lovell, William Anders. 1st manned flight with the Saturn V rocket.Second mission of the Apollo Program.The mission objectives for Apollo 8 included a coordinated performance of the crew, the command and service module, or CSM, and the support facilities. The mission also was to demonstrate translunar injection
